phrases.text: Notice the soles of your feet.
What sensations are in your body right now?
How does your body feel?
phrases.subphrase: What is your posture like right now?

phrases.text: Pause. Notice 5 things you can see. Notice 5 things you can hear. Notice 5 things you can feel.
phrases.subphrase: Now try to notice them all together.

phrases.text: Press your feet firmly into the floor. Push down, noticing how it supports you.
phrases.subphrase: Notice your body and the force of gravity moving through it. Notice what your five senses are picking up right now.

phrases.text: Notice anything blue you can see around you.
Notice your body now. Release any tension you can.
Notice what your five senses are picking up right now.
Inhale for 4 counts. Hold for 4 counts. Exhale for 4 counts. Hold for 4 counts.
Breathe slowly 3 times. Exhale slowly.
phrases.subphrase: Notice your lungs emptying and filling again. Notice your shoulders rising and falling. Let your thoughts go.

phrases.text: Breathe consciously, counting ten breaths, focusing on bringing your attention to the present moment.
phrases.subphrase: Observe how your body feels. Let the parts of your face that may be tense relax. Drop your shoulders, loosen your limbs, your abdomen, your chest, your back.

phrases.text: You are not your thoughts.
What thoughts are present right now?
Your mind is not your friend.
phrases.subphrase: Don't let it choose for you.

phrases.text: What does your mind sound like right now?
Identify the thoughts appearing right now.
phrases.subphrase: Hooking into those thoughts right now, does it bring you closer to what matters in your life?

phrases.text: Notice what your mind is telling you right now.
What emotions or feelings are present right now?
How are you treating yourself right now?
Do the next activity at half speed.
phrases.subphrase: Notice what comes up when you do.

phrases.text: Breathe. Notice what you're feeling right now. Make space for it.
phrases.subphrase: Notice what your mind is saying. Acknowledge it. Notice what is valuable right now. Come back to this moment.

phrases.text: What are you doing right now?
phrases.subphrase: From 1 to 10, how important is this for your life? From 1 to 10, how enjoyable is this activity?

phrases.text: Where has your attention been in the last few minutes?
What is there to be grateful for right now?
What thoughts and feelings were present the last time you read these lines?
phrases.subphrase: What thoughts and feelings are present now?
